db:abstract.db:para: How to load images asynchronously in QML.

db:article.db:programlisting:
TEMPLATE = lib CONFIG += plugin QT += qml quick
DESTDIR = ImageResponseProviderCore TARGET = qmlimageresponseproviderplugin

EXAMPLE_FILES = imageresponseprovider-example.qml
target.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/imageresponseprovider/ImageResponseProviderCore qml.files = ImageResponseProviderCore/qmldir qml.path = $$[QT_INSTALL_EXAMPLES]/quick/imageresponseprovider/ImageResponseProviderCore INSTALLS = target qml
